titles: To all ingenuous people a second intimation from the New Undertakers for conveyance of letters at half the rates to severall parts of England and Scotland.
author: Oxenbridge, Clement.
notes: Signed at end: Clement Oxenbridge, Francis Thomson, Richard Blackwall and William Malyne.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Postal service --  England --  Early works to 1800.
